docs.title: 🔐 Encryption Service
docs.text: A lightweight Python-based encryption and decryption tool built with the cryptography library. Secure your sensitive data with ease through symmetric encryption, and manage your keys efficiently.

docs.title: ✨ Features
docs.text:
• 🔐 AES encryption and decryption (Fernet – symmetric key)
  • 🔑 Key generation, saving, and loading
  • 🧰 Easy CLI interface (coming soon)
  • ⚙️ Ready for integration with PostgreSQL, APIs, or services
  • 💻 Cross-platform (Windows, macOS, Linux)

docs.title: 🧪 Integration Guide
docs.text:
To use encryption_service in other projects:

  1. Import keys_manager and encryption.
  2. Load or generate your encryption key.
  3. Use encrypt() and decrypt().

✅ Perfect for PostgreSQL, APIs, Flask apps, and more.

docs.title: 💣 Brute-Force Simulation
docs.text:
Run the brute-force demo:

py tests\brute_force_simulation.py

Fernet uses 256-bit symmetric keys. That's 2^256 combinations — brute-forcing is impractical.
